full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BYANG CHUB LAM GYI RIM PA'I SNYING PO BSDUS PA DNGOS GRUB KUN 'BYUNG BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @015B (CES BYANG CHUB LAM GYI RIM PA'I SNYING PO BSDUS PA DNGOS GRUB KUN 'BYUNG ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, SNGA MO NAS DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN MANG POS BSKUL MA YANG YANG 'BYUNG ZHING, NYE CHAR 'JAM MGON BSTAN PA'I SNYING PO LA MI PHYED PA'I DAD PA CAN LHA LCAM RIN CHEN SKYID 'DZOM GYIS BYANG CHUB LAM GYI RIM PA'I KHRID MDOR BSDUS SNYING POR DRIL BA RGYUN DUU BSKYANG CHOG PA ZHIG DGOS ZHES NAN GYIS BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS, BLA MA DAM PA RNAMS KYI ZHABS RDUL SPYI BO'I RGYAN DU 'DZIN PA DGE SLONG YE SHES RGYAL MTSAN GYIS, YUL SKYID GRONG GI NAGS KHROD BKRA SHIS BSAM GTAN GLING DU SBYAR BA'O,, ,,CES LAM RIM SNYING PO DNGOS GRUB KUN 'BYUNG ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI LHA LDAN SMON LAM RAB 'BYAMS PA'I MING 'DZIN PA YE SHES @016A *, ,DON GRUB KYIS BSKUL BA LA BYAS NAS RIGS RUS MNGON PAR MTHO BA DANG LDAN SBYIN BDAG THA'I KYI GRAGS PA RDO RJES LHAG BSAM RNAM DAG GIS KUN NAS BSLANGS TE THU MED YID 'ONG BDE GLING DU SBYAR DU BSGRUBS PA'I DGE BA 'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE PHYOGS KUN TU 'PHEL ZHING RGYAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
